meanings.definition: Not involving or related to money.
meanings.sent1: The volunteer work she did was nonmonetary.
meanings.sent2: The barter system is a nonmonetary form of trade.
meanings.sent3: His nonmonetary contribution to the project was invaluable.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a nonmonetary reward for his hard work.
meanings.sent5: The nonmonetary benefits of the job outweigh the financial ones.

meanings.definition: Not consisting of or involving money.
meanings.sent1: The company offered nonmonetary incentives to boost morale.
meanings.sent2: The prize was nonmonetary, but it meant a lot to him.
meanings.sent3: Their nonmonetary support was just as important as any financial aid.
meanings.sent4: His nonmonetary assets were his creativity and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The nonmonetary aspects of the deal were more valuable than the cash involved.
